page.title: 02NW Derby, Weekend Home Life
page.content: The time when most families are together is at the weekend. Some common activities are going shopping, visiting relatives and a special Sunday Lunch. {Helen:}On Saturday I think "Oh good, it's not school today." Then me, my sister and my Dad go to the paper shop and get some sweets and my Dad pays the papers. Then we take Mum to work. {Rebecca:}We have tea and then we go out to a club. My Mum and Dad go to the chip shop on the way home. On Sunday my sister wakes my Mum and Dad up early and they are tired in the afternoon. {Alison:}Sunday dinner is roast potatoes, carrots, peas & stuffing. After dinner we have a pudding like apple crumble, apricot crumble, apple pie with custard.
